It runs on the Android 13 operating system and is powered by the Mediatek MT6781 Helio G96 chipset with an octa-core CPU and Mali-G57 MC2 GPU. The device comes with 12GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage, which can be expanded with a microSDXC card. The main camera setup includes two 64MP lenses with f/1.9 aperture, one of which is equipped with night vision capabilities and two infrared night vision lights. The selfie camera features a 16MP lens with f/2.2 aperture. The device also has a loudspeaker and a 3.5mm headphone jack. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Bluetooth 5.2, A2DP, LE, GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS, NFC, infrared port, and wireless FM radio with RDS recording. The device is IP68/IP69K dust/water resistant, drop-to-concrete resistant, MIL-STD-810H compliant, and has an accessory connector for an ulefone endoscope, microscope, and a 1000 lumens dedicated flood flashlight. The device is available in black and priced at €359.99 / $219.99 / ₹42,000.

Overall, the Pantech Flex  P8010 is a smartphone that offers a good balance of features and performance, making it a suitable choice for anyone looking for a reliable and versatile device.

generated.out: The Razer Phone 2 is a smartphone developed by Razer. It features a 5.72-inch IGZO IPS LCD display with a resolution of 1440 x 2560 pixels and a 120Hz refresh rate. The device runs on Android 8.1 (Oreo) and can be upgraded to Android 9.0 (Pie). It is powered by a Qualcomm SDM845 Snapdragon 845 chipset with an Octa-core CPU and an Adreno 630 GPU. The phone has 8GB of RAM and 64GB of internal storage, which can be expanded with a microSDXC card. The main camera features a 12MP wide lens and a 12MP telephoto lens, while the selfie camera has an 8MP lens. The device also has a dual-LED dual-tone flash, panorama, and HDR features. The Razer Phone 2 has a 4000mAh non-removable battery that supports 18W wired and 15W wireless charging. The device features a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass sensors. It also has a USB Type-C port and supports Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, NFC, and radio connectivity. The Razer Phone 2 is available in two colors: Mirror back and Rugged satin. The device has a loudspeaker with Dolby Atmos stereo speakers and supports 24-bit/192kHz audio. The Razer Phone 2 has a high-performance rating, with an AnTuTu score of 286076 (v7), a GeekBench score of 9110 (v4.4), and a GFXBench score of 22fps (ES 3.1 onscreen). The device also has a high contrast ratio of 948 (nominal) and 2.932 (sunlight), and a good camera performance. The Razer Phone 2 has a battery endurance rating of 70 hours.
